topic.title: Hospital Discharge Physical Section - conformance rules

lines.i: The Hospital Discharge Physical section records a narrative description of the patient's physical findings.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:10460 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.26"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15363)/@code="10184-0" Hospital Discharge Physical (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15364)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15363)/@code="10184-0" Hospital Discharge Physical (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15364)
